content:
cilium-dbg bpf ipcache 
 Manage the IPCache mappings for IP/CIDR <-> Identity 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for ipcache
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg bpf 	 - Direct access to local BPF maps 
 cilium-dbg bpf ipcache delete 	 - Delete an entry for a prefix 
 cilium-dbg bpf ipcache get 	 - Retrieve identity for an ip 
 cilium-dbg bpf ipcache list 	 - List endpoint IPs (local and remote) and their corresponding security identities 
 cilium-dbg bpf ipcache match 	 - Retrieve identity for a prefix using an exact match 
 cilium-dbg bpf ipcache update 	 - Update an entry for a prefix
